title.description: The title of the professional development program.

description.description: A detailed description of the program.

programStatus.description: Current status of the program (e.g., active, planning, completed).

programStatusDate.description: The date when the program status was last updated.

planYear.description: The year in which the program is planned.

audience.description: A predefined list of audience types.

topicArea.description: A predefined list of topic areas.

frontMatter.description: Indicates if front matter is included in the program materials.

store.description: Indicates if the program is stored or archived.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the program planning.
